visual.name: populationpyramid
visual.description: Population distribution for each sex against age cohorts

dataRoles.name: col_3
dataRoles.description: Male population to show as labels

dataRoles.name: col_4
dataRoles.description: Female population to show as labels

license.description: Applicable only when license is acquired from https://pbivizedit.com and not from Microsoft AppSource.

companyName.description: Name of the company or person to which license is issued

expirationDate.description: Your license is valid till given date (YYYY-MM-DD)

sorts.description: Stores sort definitions defined in sorting dialog

axisSorts.description: Stores sort definitions defined for each axis

dataVersion.description: current data version stored for backward compatibility purposes

analytics.description: Stores analytics definitions defined in analytic dialog

displayToolbar.description: Determines toolbar should be displayed or not when user is editing report.

maxRows.description: Defines maximum number of rows to fetch, in the multiple of 5000 rows.

scroll.description: Determine scroll behavior of the chart

position.description: Select the location of the Legend

title.description: Display a title on legend symbols

direction.description: Small multiple charts should draw from left to right OR from top to bottom.

pointCount.description: When the direction is Left to right, these are the maximum columns that can come. For Top to bottom these are maximum rows.

coupleXAxis.description: Show only Bottom X Axis and hide rest of the X Axis

coupleYAxis.description: Show only Left Y Axis and hide rest of the Y Axis

matchXRange.description: Make all x axis ranges same

matchYRange.description: Make all y axis ranges same

side.description: Define where should the axis be placed with w.r.t. anchored y axis

show.description: Show/hide axis, it's line and axis labels altogether

showLine.description: Show/hide axis line. This keeps labels intact

axisAutoRange.description: Allow user to define axis range manually.

axisRangeLowerBound.description: Lower value of range bound axis. For linear axis, it is number. For log axis, it is log of desired value. For Date axis, it is date in YYYY-MM-DD format. For category axis, it is number with first category treated as 0.

axisRangeUpperBound.description: Upper value of range bound axis. For linear axis, it is number. For log axis, it is log of desired value. For Date axis, it is date in YYYY-MM-DD format. For category axis, it is number with first category treated as 0.

titleText.description: Text to display as title. Leave blank to compute automatically.

showTicks.description: Show/hide tick lines on this axis

axisTicksPosition.description: Inside when ticks are drawn towards the chart area. Outside draws ticks outward of the chart area.

isAxisLabelAngleCustom.description: True to manually set axis label angle

axisLabelAngle.description: Define axis label angle. It can be from -90 to 90. To draw labels vertically, choose 90

axisLabelPrefix.description: Prefix will be added before the axis label.

axisLabelSuffix.description: Suffix will be added after axis label.

axisLabelFormat.description: Axis label format. This supports D3 formats and not PowerBI formats as of now.

axisRangeType.description: Define axis data type. Choose 'Auto' to select automatically.

side.description: Define where should the axis be placed with w.r.t. anchored x axis

show.description: Show/hide axis, it's line and axis labels altogether

showLine.description: Show/hide axis line. This keeps labels intact

titleText.description: Text to display as title. Leave blank to compute automatically.

showTicks.description: Show/hide tick lines on this axis

axisTicksPosition.description: Inside when ticks are drawn towards the chart area. Outside draws ticks outward of the chart area.

isAxisLabelAngleCustom.description: True to manually set axis label angle

axisLabelAngle.description: Define axis label angle. It can be from -90 to 90. To draw labels vertically, choose 90

axisLabelPrefix.description: Prefix will be added before the axis label.

axisLabelSuffix.description: Suffix will be added after axis label.

axisLabelFormat.description: Axis label format. This supports D3 formats and not PowerBI formats as of now.

showLine.description: Show/hide axis line. This keeps labels intact

axisAutoRange.description: Allow user to define axis range manually.

axisRangeLowerBound.description: Lower value of range bound axis. For linear axis, it is number. For log axis, it is log of desired value. For Date axis, it is date in YYYY-MM-DD format. For category axis, it is number with first category treated as 0.

axisRangeUpperBound.description: Upper value of range bound axis. For linear axis, it is number. For log axis, it is log of desired value. For Date axis, it is date in YYYY-MM-DD format. For category axis, it is number with first category treated as 0.

titleText.description: Text to display as title. Leave blank to compute automatically.

axisTicksPosition.description: Inside when ticks are drawn towards the chart area. Outside draws ticks outward of the chart area.

isAxisLabelAngleCustom.description: True to manually set axis label angle

axisLabelAngle.description: Define axis label angle. It can be from -90 to 90. To draw labels vertically, choose 90

axisLabelPrefix.description: Prefix will be added before the axis label.

axisLabelSuffix.description: Suffix will be added after axis label.

axisLabelFormat.description: Axis label format. This supports D3 formats and not PowerBI formats as of now.

opacity.description: Opacity of bar. It's value can be from 0 to 1. 0 means the bar is transparent.

transparency.description: Transparency of bar. It's value can be from 0 to 100. 100 means the bar is transparent.

borderWidth.description: border width of the bar in px

textFormatType.description: Select the label units (millions, billions, etc.)

textPrecision.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for labels

text.description: Define custom format to format labels.

textConstrain.description: Switch off if you want to define custom label font size

opacity.description: Opacity of bar. It's value can be from 0 to 1. 0 means the bar is transparent.

transparency.description: Transparency of bar. It's value can be from 0 to 100. 100 means the bar is transparent.

borderWidth.description: border width of the bar in px

textFormatType.description: Select the label units (millions, billions, etc.)

textPrecision.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for labels

text.description: Define custom format to format labels.

textConstrain.description: Switch off if you want to define custom label font size

lineOpacity.description: Opacity of line. It's value can be from 0 to 1. 0 means the line is transparent.

lineTransparency.description: Transparency of line. It's value can be from 0 to 100. 100 means the line is transparent.

thickness.description: Determines how thick the line can be.

shape.description: Determines line shape. For example, smooth.
